children.name: urllib3.exceptions.MaxRetryError: HTTPConnectionPool(host='10.1.46.140', port=49152): Max retries exceeded with url: /metrics (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.HTTPConnection object at 0x7fae7d231540>: Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 111] Connection refused'))
